list_variables.description: The non-key attribute names that are projected into the index.
list_variables.name: NonKeyAttributes

variables.description: The set of attributes that are projected into the index:
variables.name: ProjectionType

variables.description: Only the index and primary keys are projected into the                               index.
variables.name: KEYS_ONLY

variables.description: Only the specified table attributes are projected into the index.                               The list of projected attributes are in                               NonKeyAttributes.
variables.name: INCLUDE

variables.description: All of the table attributes are projected into the index.
variables.name: ALL
